summary: In 1920s Ireland, I.R.A. members are being lead by the war mongering Dr. Sean Lenihan (James Cagney), as they fight oppressive British forces.
cast: James Cagney|Don Murray|Dana Wynter|Glynis Johns|Michael Redgrave|Sybil Thorndike|Cyril Cusack|Marianne Benet|John Breslin|Harry Brogan|Robert Brown|Lewis Casson|Christopher Casson|John Cairney|Harry H. Corbett|Eileen Crowe|Allan Cuthbertson|Donal Donnelly|Wilfred Downing|Eithne Dunne|Paul Farrell|Richard Harris|William Hartnell|John Le Mesurier|Niall MacGinnis|Patrick McAlinney|Ray McAnally|Clive Morton|Noel Purcell|Peter Reynolds|Christopher Rhodes|Ronnie Walsh|Alan White|Eamonn Andrews|Walter Gotell|T.P. McKenna|Norman Rodway
